name: yawned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
yawn
B1 to open the mouth wide and take a lot of air into the lungs and slowly send it out, usually when tired or bored: I can't stop yawning - I must be tired.
More examplesFewer examplesHe yawned loudly in the middle of her speech.I was so tired, I couldn't help yawning.
